name: DailyStock
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Problem:
Most investors spend a significant amount of time checking the latest stock news across different financial websites or channels, this is going to be time-consuming and not too productive?

Solution:
We want to gather the latest stock news across major financial channels and quote you in one place to save you time and get the critical information for your sound investment decision. 

What is next?
We will conduct more research and adding more stock news flash briefing to the app.

If you want to play our 'Daily Stock' flash briefing in the first place when you speak to your Alexa device or from your mobile phone Alexa app, please see the setup guide here https://www.amazon.com/gp/help/customer/display.html?nodeId=GXMFWZJ8FKRGLFFU. There are currently 12 feeds available, you should add all feeds in your flash briefing setting page, see the snapshot example here https://drive.google.com/file/d/1BcWZE_tvNKFpX4ePtEimyS1rLRTdb1xs/view?usp=sharing. We will add more news feeds gradually, if you want to play all feeds, you should check the updates and add all in your flash briefing setting page.

How to skip the Flash Briefing news?
Just saying 'Alexa, Next', it will play the next news for you. If you want to stop the news, just say 'Alexa, Stop', then it will stop the news at that point, when you come back, it will continue to play the news where you have left.

Note: There are some news might not be playing because there is no daily update information.

Check out our another Alexa app called 'Dummy Stock' if you want to learn more about the basic stock market FAQ and how to balance your money from risk vs profit.

Contact us if you have any advice or issues with the app.
biz2voice88@gmail.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
